languages.text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.
languages.original_text: Офицер немедленно предоставляет союзнику дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. В течение этого {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g} цель может использовать только способности передвижения, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героические акты{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}. Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца хода офицера.

traits.locale_text: The Leader immediately grants an ally additional movement points equal to (Leader's FEL bonus).{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it ignores attacks of opportunity until the end of the Leader's turn.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

languages.text:
Офицер немедленно предоставляет союзнику дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. В течение этого {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g} цель может использовать только способности передвижения, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героические акты{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}.
Если на цель действует {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g}, она игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца хода офицера.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

traits.locale_text:
Офицер немедленно предоставляет союзнику дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. В течение этого {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g} цель может использовать только способности передвижения, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героические акты{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}.
Если на цель действует {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g}, она игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца хода офицера.
Лидер немедленно предоставляет союзнику дополнительные ОП в количестве, равном бонус ОБЩ лидера.{br} Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она игнорирует атаки по возможности до конца хода лидера.

Лидер немедленно предоставляет союзнику дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.{br} Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} лидера.

languages.text:
军官立刻给予盟友一个额外回合，该盟友在此额外回合中拥有{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。在此{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}中，受影响的目标只能使用移动能力、{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}。
如果该盟友受到{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}的效果影响，则该盟友无视任何{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，直到军官的回合结束。
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

traits.locale_text: 领袖使目标盟友立刻获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友无视任何{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}，直到领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

领袖使目标盟友立刻获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友无视任何{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}，直到领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}立刻给予盟友一个额外回合，该盟友在此额外回合中拥有{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。在此{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}中，受影响的目标只能使用移动能力、{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友无视任何{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，直到军官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text:
El oficial concede inmediatamente {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al objetivo. El objetivo solo puede usar capacidades de movimiento, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g} durante el {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}.
Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, ignora {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el final del turno del oficial.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

traits.locale_text: El oficial otorga inmediatamente a un aliado tantos {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales como {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.{br} Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, ignora {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial.

El líder otorga inmediatamente a un aliado tantos {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales como la {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.{br} Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, ignora {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del líder.

languages.text:
Der Offizier gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} in Höhe von {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. Das Ziel kann in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} nur Bewegungsfähigkeiten, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} einsetzen.
Steht das Ziel unter dem Effekt von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g}, ignoriert es bis zum Ende des Zuges des Offiziers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

traits.locale_text: Der Offizier gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} in Höhe von {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.{br} Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, ignoriert es {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers.

Der Anführer gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} in Höhe des {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.{br} Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, ignoriert es {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Anführers.

languages.text:
L'officier confère immédiatement à un allié un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires égal à {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. La cible ne peut utiliser que des capacités de déplacement, des {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}.
Si la cible bénéficie de l'effet {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g}, elle ignore les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du tour de l'officier.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

traits.locale_text: Le Leader confère immédiatement à un allié un nombre supplémentaire de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} égal à {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Leader.{br} Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle ignore les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Leader.

Le Leader confère immédiatement à un allié un nombre supplémentaire de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} égal à {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.{br} Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle ignore les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Leader.

languages.text: 士官は味方に、{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}に等しい追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を即座に付与する。ターゲットはこの{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターンの間{/g}、移動アビリティ、 {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}、 {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}のいずれかのみ使用可能。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、士官のターン終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視する。
languages.original_text: The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.

traits.locale_text: 士官は味方に、{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}に等しい追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を即座に付与する。ターゲットはこの{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターンの間{/g}、移動アビリティ、 {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}、 {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}のいずれかのみ使用可能。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、士官のターン終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視する。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}は即座に味方に、{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}に等しい追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を与える。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、オフィサーの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視する。

languages.text:
Subay, bir dost birime anında {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazandırır. Hedef bu {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek turda{/g} yalnızca hareket kabiliyetlerini, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemleri{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlemleri{/g} kullanabilir.
Hedef, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisi altındaysa Subay'ın turunun sonuna dek {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} yok sayar.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. The target can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's turn.
